Package org.yamcs.artemis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TupleTranslator
    Translates between tuples and ActiveMQ messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractArtemisTranslatorService
    takes data from yamcs streams and publishes it to artemis address
    ArtemisCmdHistoryDataLink
    Receives command history data from Artemis queues and publishes into yamcs streams
    ArtemisCmdHistoryService
    Takes cmd history data from yamcs streams and publishes it to artemis address (reverse of ArtemisCmdHistoryDataLink)
    ArtemisEventDataLink
    Receives event data from Artemis queues and publishes into yamcs streams
    ArtemisEventService
    Takes event data from yarch streams and publishes it to artemis address (reverse of ArtemisEventDataLink)
    ArtemisPlugin  
    ArtemisPpService
    takes Parameter data from yarch streams and publishes it to hornetq address (reverse of ArtemisParameterDataLink) To avoid a ping-pong effect: it creates a queue with a filter on hornet side it remembers a thread local version of the tuple in transition on yarch side
    ArtemisServer
    Server wide service that initialises and starts the artemis/hornetq server
    ArtemisTmService
    Takes TM data from yamcs streams and publishes it to ActiveMQ Artemis address (reverse of ArtemisTmDataLink)
    CmdHistoryTupleTranslator  
    EventTupleTranslator  
    PpTupleTranslator
    Translates between Processed Parameter tuples and ActiveMQ messages.
    RealtimeArtemisParameterService
    Provides realtime parameter subscription via artemis.
    TmTupleTranslator
    Translates between tuples as defined in DataLinkInitialiser and ActiveMQ messages containing TmPacketData
